title: Classical Performance - Strings & Hammers - February 17, 2015
teaser: Strings and Hammers is in residence at USF and they stop by Classical WSMR to play for you live! Strings & Hammers is a twist of the traditional piano trio with violin and cello. Founded by Eunmi Ko, Sini Virtanen, and Julia Keller, the ensemble has the unusual instrumentation of piano, violin, and double bass. The members met each other at the Eastman School of Music while they were graduate students there. They shared the common interest in chamber music and new music, and naturally, they started playing together in 2013. The ensemble explores chamber music repertoire of the twentieth and twenty-first century and commissions works from emerging composers. Join Bethany Cagle for music and conversation on Classical WSMR.
